issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h4.iOS

With now 3 densities to support, we have an increase in graphics required by a  project.  It would be great if when building for dist-appstore or dist-adhoc missing splash screen and icon assets were flagged and a warning displayed for the user.

h4. Android

Android is a bit more difficult as assets are not required, but density specific resources are recommended.
fields.summary: Tooling needs project validation similar to iTunes Connect validation in xcode
